amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce national missile defense operational test and evaluation funding by $174 million and increase defense health programs accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 8 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce national missile defense operational test and evaluation funding by $174 million and increase defense health programs accordingly.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the Kucinich amendment (A003). Mr. Lewis stated that the amendment violated section 302F of the Congressional Budget Act. Point of order overruled by the Chair.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
